root.str: Customize your ground vehicle by adding a PS2 Gold Hood Ornament.
Allows the user to carry 3 EMP Spikers at a time
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to armor.
Good. The Sunderer acts as a respawn point for our allies while deployed, and is critical to any offensive push. Leave the Sunderer, and let's help press the attack.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 27 minutes.
Could not kick from squad due to bad group ID.
Unlock performance upgrades that increase the braking force of the vehicle.
Increases the amount of Merit and XP gained by 50%.
Maintain a defensive perimeter around the node!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 280 rounds.
Adds a cosmetic attachment to your ANT. All factions can use this gear.
Adds a cosmetic finish to the Dervish's cockpit glass. NSO use only.
Automatically repairs health over time. Damage disables repair for several seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Improved turn, roll, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
This gravity pad lets you move up and down, and do it quickly. Simply step on the pad and you will ascend or descend in the direction of the flowing particles.
艾美瑞什 Scrub Vehicle Camo
An uncommon liquid-like substance with intricate conductive qualities.
<font color="#7FF4FF">[/re]gionsay </font>- Sends a text message to all allies in your current region. Your current region is noted on the left side of the main screen above the map.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
Celebrate eight years of PlanetSide 2 with this special bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for all empires. Boost is only available to the character who purchased the bundle.
Sniper: Deal a total of 50,000 damage

Killing an enemy has a 12% chance to reduce the minimum cone of fire of you and your squadmates within 25 meters by 30% for 4 seconds. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.

A festive blue cap woven with Auraxium fibers.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Thank you for being a member. You can accept %0 missions each day. Non-members can accept %1.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shots.
Mosquito Death From Above Glass Decal
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> We didn't care so much about weapons of war, but more about strengthening the will of our people. Or maybe I just miss the way things used to be.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
As you earn <font color="#7FF4FF">EXPERIENCE</font> you will earn <font color="#E88127">CERTIFICATION POINTS</font>
VEHICLE TEST ITEM: Reuse as needed.
Title awarded for participating in the January 2015 world record smashing event.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Hey there, slick. So, you're helping Coordinator Dustypants with his little Oshur expedition? That's great news for us both because it's an opportunity for fun and profit! Mostly fun for you and profit for me, but it is what it is.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%.
Apply the Indar Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 200 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
The NS-11A was designed as a customizable weapon system that could adapt to nearly every situation. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.
Learn about the Terran Republic's quest for order.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly</font> With Esamir's Biolabs destroyed it's been a logistical nightmare getting all these plants to our researchers before they wither.
Allows the Infiltrator to spot enemy explosives and relay that information to nearby friendly soldiers.
Get a selection of Valkyrie weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
Eliminate the enemies around the control point!
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Hold [%s] to Hack the door lock
Spawn a Colossus Tank from the terminal.
Meters traveled as a vehicle gunner.
Specialize your player-made bases by using a variety of tactical modules. Unlocks construction schematics that create shields, repair, sound the alarm, and more.
Enemy convoy is now departing from [*warpgate*] to reinforce [*facility*].
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 720 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Safety Equipment</font> - One of the benefits of Esamir blowing up was the protective equipment and vehicle plating that came from it. We've got enough gear to do quick runs in and out of the energy vortex, but this is a big assignment, so we'll need enough protective equipment to continue operations for months.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600.
You are now the fireteam leader!
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 22 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 bombs.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. VS use only.
Killing a vehicle within 50 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle, and heals your vehicle for 10% max health. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon. It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. All factions can use this weapon.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> Hello, operative. I miss running point on convoy missions. All I do is coordinate mining operations and hand out portable mining lasers. Mind recording a vid of you tearing up the road in a ground vehicle of your choice?
Apply the Carbonation camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
A refined storage system allows the user to draw and holster the weapon more quickly.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Apply the Splatter camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Apply the single use Esamir Ice camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Switching to your pistol is always faster than reloading your primary weapon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 shells.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider. VS use only.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Engineer. VS use only.
The [*faction*] has linked to the northwest warpgate +[*points*] VP!
Contains schematics for the Glaive IPC, Orbital Strike Uplink, and the Reinforcement Module. Unlocks for all factions.
Reduces damage from small arms, heavy machine guns, and gatling guns by 20%.
Will you truly allow yourself to lose?
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 750 rounds.
Increases the top speed of the Magrider by 2 KPH.
Earn this service ribbon by defending facilities.

In the Implant Foundry, rank 1 implants you do not currently own can be crafted using ISO-4. ISO-4 is rewarded through event and alert participation, and is gained by breaking down duplicate implants found in Implant Packs.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Mission complete, operative. Once violence has ceased in your vicinity, your presence is needed to investigate heat signatures that are now marked on your map.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Sunderer Hood Ornament.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the Chimera. NSO use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of light changes based on your current faction.</font>
Praetor Umatherin can be found onboard Sanctuary on the Observation Deck bridge.
Change the quality and distance that you will see higher quality models before they switch to lower detail models.
The Kindred carbine fires high caliber rounds quickly on trigger press, and then settles into a more rhythmic firing rate after a short time. For TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> We need you to collect schematics from a couple of enemy facilities. Ideally during a skirmish as to avoid drawing additional attention, but I'll leave the details up to you.
This empire specific edition of Nanite Systems' HS/NV scope has no magnification, but provides high contrast illumination of nearby soldiers.
Single Use Pine Forest Weapon Camo
Seriously, this is a huge sale!
Further reduces the reuse timer of the EMP Spiker.
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer.
Squad invitation is no longer valid.
Lets everyone around you know that a trip in your Galaxy is comperable to a luxury cruise.
The Wasp has been fitted with the ability to transport Cortium, as well as numerous performance improvements.
Integrated power cells increase Jump Jet maximum fuel by 40%, and Ambusher Jump Jet's cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

Clear the waters with a loud declaration before splashing in or emit a sonar ping while stalking your enemies below the waves. This horn plays different sounds when above or below the water. All factions can use this gear.
The P2-120 AP is loaded with fast-moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets, but have less explosive yield than other projectiles. TR use only.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.
ALERT: HIVE SHIELD UNDER ATTACK, SHIELD INTEGRITY BELOW 100%!
Unlock the VE-A Lacerta with a full complement of attachments. For VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 shots.
This customization adds a Yellow decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
艾美瑞什 Outpost Capture Status

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 41% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
//// TR Field Commander Welcome, 艾美瑞什.
The driver of this vehicle has disconnected!
Adds the Drifter style hubcaps to your Harasser. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> That was quite the detective work you did out there, acolyte. Perhaps not as action-packed as you're used to, but valuable none-the-less.

Unlocks the Lightning Arrester for your tactical loadout slot. Arresters are resupplied using Campaign currency.

Single use consumable. Max 1 between resupplies.
Deploy a device that will redirect and absorb nearby lightning strikes to itself. An absorbed bolt will not harm anything except the device itself. Only 1 Lightning Arrester can be active at a time.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Equipment terminals are also used to change classes.Interact with an equipment terminal, then select the class you'd like to use from the menu.Click the Equip button to change into that class.
The NS Patriot Flare Gun fires flares of all shapes and colors. All factions can use this weapon.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Reaver. NC use only.
Decal of Japan Vanu Sovereignty Guardians
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 8.33% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 8 seconds.

A festive red cap featuring the Terran Republic's logo.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> I don't see any damage, just graffiti. Enabling the diagnostics system should show us anything in need of manual repairs.
Increases turbo fuel regeneration rate. An empty fuel tank will refill completely in 22.5 seconds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Pistol Hood Ornament. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Allows use of various weapon attachments
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210 rounds.
This customization adds a decal to your amor. Usable by all factions.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Increases the Javelin's drift and slide capabilities.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
VS - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V3 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the turn rate of the aircraft.
Impossibly good sales, you say? Nothing's impossible when you're Nanite Ned.

Deploy a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield for 30 seconds. Allies near the booster have greatly increased jump height.

Single use consumable. Carry up to 2 on the field between resupplies. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increases outfit resource contributions for 1 Day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Regenerates 35 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 55%.

Auraxis has been at war for longer than most can remember, allowing soldiers to take for granted technology that wasn't available in the earliest days of the conflict. Prior to the rebirthing matrix, death was final. And those who fell on Oshur during the evacuation have been left alone for longer than they deserve. It's time to bring them home.

Vehicles that remain in the storm for too long will become overloaded with Tempest energy, eventually causing the vehicle to explode. Deployed vehicles are considered "grounded," and take a burst of damage, instead of being destroyed outright.

A deployable box of cookies, candy, and ammunition for all the good soldiers of Auraxis.

Only available during Auraximas.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Ayla:</font> "Eternal war in a land forgot. For spoils of ash and stores of rot. Still crest the hill. For right or will. Lest our fathers fall be for naught." How sad. And beautiful. Thank you, operative.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey kid, normally this sort of tech is reserved for mining expeditions... but so long as you follow the instructions and don't kill anyone, everything should be fine.
The Valkyrie is a six person aircraft used for close air support and transportation. It is crewed by a pilot and a forward gunner.
Reduces damage taken from flak by 6%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Hmm. Must not have been enough strength to assemble the aircraft. But it gives us a rough location on the researcher who escaped the flooded base. And that location is on Oshur. Take to the skies and find them.
Victory Over Internet Protocol Vehicle Decal

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that your actions qualify you for one (1) refabricated Skylance grav rotor. Such an item has been deployed beneath a tree in Sanctuary.
Be aware, Vanu scientists have recently added additional directive tracking capacity to your rebirthing matrix. Exceptional achievements are now incorporated into future rebirths.
Designed for raw power, this black variant of the Decimator is unmatched in its destructive potential against enemy vehicles and infantry. All factions can use NS weapons.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Scythe. VS use only.
Increases the amount of Merit and XP gained by 50%.
Creates a laser grid overhead that will severely injure enemy infantry that pass through it. TR only.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
The Focused Proton AP is a hard-hitting armor piercing plasma cannon that delivers massive damage to armored targets. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.
This customization adds a Red Metallic decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 450 rounds.
Nanoweave Armor is capable of absorbing more damage than its standard issue counterpart

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> Early attempts to reach Oshur failed due to the presence of a massive energy barrier. As they were unable to smash through it, they contracted Nascent Expeditions to aid in the efforts. And therein lies an opportunity.
Illuminate the battlefield with these front-facing Duskbuster Headlights for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
Increases the top speed of the Vanguard by 2 KPH.
Improved brakes, turn, and roll. (More effective than previous rank)
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Our work with the subspace cipher has revealed a final puzzle piece, a last, unanswered question.
Completing the final directive tier awards you with highly classified <font color="#7ff4ff">Auraxium weapons and gear</font>.
An allied commander has placed this smoke beacon to call attention to a particular location. If you are uncertain of your orders, make sure to request more information on the target.
Applies a camo to your vehicle. TR use only.
You can accept a limited number of Missions daily that grant you bonus rewards on completion. Access the Mission Board by pressing "i" by default.
Infiltrator: Kill at least 3 players with a C-4 Explosive
Allows use of additional fire modes
Vehicle - Valkyrie - Weapon 06 - 60mm - Ammo - Ammo Capacity 10
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 grenades.
Improved hover, air brake, and vertical thrust. (More effective than previous rank)
Applies your Outfit's chosen decal to your armor. May only be used by the purchasing character.
Today Only! Solid Dark Tan Camo Available!
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Teleporters provide quick transportation within the facility. Step on the pad to begin the process.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 130 rounds.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Rocket Launcher lock-on Angle Skill Line Description
Ah, a loyal soldier of the Republic, eh? Step up, trooper. I have an urgent mission to discuss with you.
Allied control points increase shield capacity
<font color="#00FFAA">Archivist Dolan:</font> A pity that Foster could not be here to see it.
The R85 Rocket Launcher is ideal for engaging heavily armored targets

The MASC system provides a cloaking shield layer, yielding up to 100 additional effective health. Cloaking can remain active so long as the shield layer has not been destroyed, and the cloak must be fully recharged before it can be reactivated.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Squad Deploy is unavailable to MAXes. Redeploy or change classes at an equipment terminal to use Squad Deploy.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.

Increases holiday xp bonus on all Holiday Hats by 10%! Remember to requip your hat.

Only applies to purchased Holiday Hats

Increases the Bombardment Shield's base damage resistance of 50% to 57%

The Bombardment Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.

Normal fall damage now starts at 75 meters, lethal fall damage starts near 230 meters, and you take 20% less damage from vehicles that collide with you. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 490 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 18%.
MAXes wear vehicle-class power armor with modular weapon systems that can be configured to handle infantry, vehicles, and aircraft.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.

This is a Test Server. It is going to have issues and downtime that Live Servers will not, but it provides access to many features and changes before they get to live servers - providing players an opportunity to participate in testing and provide feedback.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the amount of time required to switch fire modes for 1 hour.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1000 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
And One To Grow On Vehicle Decal
Deployment options are on the left side of the map.
The Twin 120mm Cannon AP fires armor piercing rounds that are capable of inflicting maximum damage to armored targets

The original BAR-100 was considered a failed project before corporate discovered that manufacturers were cutting production costs by using a cheaper, if extremely lightweight, material in its construction. Most of the prototypes were discarded, but a few may still be found in the hands of collectors.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Dahaka!
A keepsake from your exploration of the storm-ravaged Esamir, this frost-worn pick is the perfect tool to break the tension.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 shells.
Tail gun secondary weapon covers an area behind the Liberator. Operated by the passenger in seat 3.
Apply the Grey Scales camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Deploys a Xiphos Anti-Infantry Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120.
Your score will go down if you hit ally targets.
Unlock the XMG-155 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Good, soldier. The origin of the transmission should be nearby. Use the primary fire of your Signal Scanner to determine your distance from the target.
The Terran Republic has taken Allatum!
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 11 minutes.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.

Developers, Quality Assurance, and other Daybreak employees will be on this server frequently, and may request your help to test specific things

Report any issues via the in-game bug report tool or through a Test Server forum post

Characters and actions on the Test Server do not transfer to Live, or vice versa

Progression values differ significantly from live, providing large amounts of cert points for each new character to enable efficient testing

Test Server character wipes are a possibility as need arises

There is no Customer Service support or any real money transactions on Test

For more information and details, check out our Test Server Policies on the forums
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 5 missiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 675 rounds.
You can right-click on the map to add waypoints for you and your squad.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.

Increases the speed at which your shields regenerate to full by 38%.
The Vanu Sovereignty has defended Rashnu!
Improve the Lightning's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
You can still take advantage of this offer by clicking "Get Daybreak Cash" in the Depot
Cortium nodes continually spawn throughout Auraxis; the larger the node, the more Cortium that can be harvested!
Increases Magburner's recharge speed by 15% and allows horizontal mobility while thrusters are active.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 120 seconds.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V2 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 shells.
Infantry Render Distance Setting. This specifies the maximum distance that an object will be rendered while on foot. Can be set between 300m and 6000m (Default 4000m)
Apply the Purple Chrome camo pattern to your vehicle.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> Drill activated. Maximum lifespan is set to 5 minutes.
Scout Radar detects the movement of hostiles at a range of 200 meters.
You are not in a platoon.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Well done, soldier. Your efforts will be rewarded.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Harasser by 240 seconds.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gold Tiger Fins. VS use only.
Allows use of the long range 8x Albatross-Eight sniper scope.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> This would be the Reliquary for the facility. Extra barriers have been placed to keep some of the more valuable artifacts from walking out of here.
Designed to provide easily controllable recoil, the Exodus GD-17 can effortlessly make follow-up shots on distant targets.

Standard MAX units are able to perform emergency repairs once per minute, repairing some of the damage they have sustained. There are other options to explore, some are different depending on the MAX's empire.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Enemy spotted near the control node.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a VS Hood Ornament. VS use only.
The spawn tube is where enemy soldiers will spawn
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Variant of the Standard Terran Republic Light Assault Helmet.
Celebrate where it all began with an homage to PlanetSide 1 in a compact deployable form. This item is only available during the PS1 Anniversary event.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4% every 1 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 540 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
Celebrate 16 years of the PlanetSide franchise with this special bundle. This bundle grants cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Proximity mines and other tools no longer detect the user while cloaked and crouch walking.
Resupplies ammo to ally vehicles within 30 meters.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. Available for all factions.
Adds a spare tire to the back of the Sunderer.
Fire Ten Shots as a Light Assault
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 Vehicle Camo
A shield control generator has been damaged.

Upon detonation, the Flash Grenade will temporarily blind, deafen, and reduce the accuracy of infantry within its blast radius, making it perfect for breaching crowded rooms.

3 second fuse.
Deployable field supply terminal to resupply friendly soldiers

The Charged Proton PPA is a heavy-hitting pulsed particle acceleration plasma cannon. It has an increased rate of fire which comes at a cost of lower armor penetration. This cannon requires a charge before it can be fired.
Increases the minimum number of shots before overheat by 4, but reduces the rate at which the weapon passively cools off by 25%.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 30 minutes.
Reduces the time before health begins regenerating while not in combat.

Headshot kills grant 50% faster weapon rechamber speed for 3 seconds; chaining headshots can store a maximum of 8 seconds worth of rechamber speed. Additionally, kills beyond 70 meters will also trigger this benefit.<font color="#dc9c36"> Only useable with Sniper Rifles.</font>
Apply the Ortho Digital camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning. NC use only.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Auto-spots enemies who damage or kill you if they are not using a suppressed weapon.

Killing an enemy has a 20% chance to reduce the minimum cone of fire of you and your squadmates within 25 meters by 30% for 4 seconds. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.
Passively increases vehicle total Cortium Storage by 1500.
An advanced laser sight increases hipfire accuracy by 40%.

Finishing a reload will increase your sprint speed by 10%, your jump height significantly, and allow you to enter sprint almost instantly, for the next 1.5 seconds. Firing your weapon ends this effect early.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Scythe for 1 hour. Rank 8 required.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

Applies a decal to your armor. Available for all factions.
Change classes at the equipment terminal.

MAX units do not have a personal shield like other infantry, so damage sustained must be repaired like a vehicle. The Engineer's tools can repair the MAX, while a downed MAX must be revived by a Combat Medic.



The exo-suit is bulky, which hinders mobility and prevents the MAX from riding in most vehicles that aren't dedicated transports.



Unlike standard infantry, the MAX is unable to influence control points.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 missiles.

Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.

Apply the single use Esamir Ice camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 10%.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 980 rounds.
Unable to capture point while in a MAX suit.

Killing an enemy has a 20% chance to reduce the minimum cone of fire of you and your squadmates within 25 meters by 30% for 4 seconds. Additionally, this implant has a 2% chance to trigger whenever experience is gained. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.
Provides ample protection without excessively weighing down the user
Enables the Sunderer to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station, which acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers.
A popular sidearm amongst TR soldiers, the high-capacity TX2 Emperor has been in service for over 200 years. TR use only.
Increases the time it takes for the turret to overheat during sustained fire to 9 seconds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 71%.
